actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

official_title: A bill to establish a pilot program awarding competitive grants to organizations administering entrepreneurial development programming to formerly incarcerated individuals, and for other purposes.
short_title: Necessary Entrepreneurship Workshops via the SBA to Transform and Assist Re-entry Training Act of 2019

titles.title: A bill to establish a pilot program awarding competitive grants to organizations administering entrepreneurial development programming to formerly incarcerated individuals, and for other purposes.
